School Specialization (Transmutation): Extra Transmutation spell/dy each spell level

Enlarge Spell: x2 chosen spell range uses +1 spell slot
Quicken Spell: Free action casting 1/rd uses +4 spell slot
School Opposition (Conjuration): Cannot learn or cast Conjuration spells
School Opposition (Illusion): Cannot learn or cast Illusion spells
Scribe Scroll: Create scroll of any known spell
Silent Spell: Cast spell w/out speech uses +1 spell slot
Still Spell: Cast spell w/out movement uses +1 spell slot
